alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 4:53PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Worcester, southeastern Hampshire, northwestern Middlesex, southeastern Franklin and southeastern Hampden Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 452 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Warren, or 18 miles east of Springfield, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Orange, Gardner, Southbridge, Charlton, Palmer, Spencer, Athol, Winchendon, Ware, Sturbridge, Monson, Templeton, Rutland, Westminster, Ashburnham, Barre, Warren, Paxton, North Brookfield and Hubbardston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
